select.id: select様式番号別支給金額情報

mapper.sql:
WITH 様式番号別集計 AS ( SELECT 償還払."hiHokenshaNo", 償還払."serviceTeikyoYM", 償還払."seiriNo", 償還払."yoshikiNo", SUM(償還払."shikyuKingaku") AS sum支給金額, SUM(償還払."sagakuKingaku") AS sum差額金額 FROM rgdb."DbT3043ShokanShokujiHiyo" AS 償還払 INNER JOIN "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" AS 一時 ON 償還払."hiHokenshaNo" = 一時."hihokenshaNo" AND 償還払."serviceTeikyoYM" = 一時."serviceTeikyoYM" AND 償還払."seiriNo" = 一時."seiriNo" AND 一時."dataKubun" = '1' AND 一時."kozaDataFlag" = TRUE GROUP BY 償還払."hiHokenshaNo",償還払."serviceTeikyoYM",償還払."seiriNo",償還払."yoshikiNo" UNION ALL SELECT 償還払."hiHokenshaNo", 償還払."serviceTeikyoYM", 償還払."seiriNo", 償還払."yoshikiNo", SUM(償還払."shikyuKingaku") AS sum支給金額, SUM(償還払."sagakuKingaku") AS sum差額金額 FROM rgdb."DbT3045ShokanServicePlan200004" AS 償還払 INNER JOIN "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" AS 一時 ON 償還払."hiHokenshaNo" = 一時."hihokenshaNo" AND 償還払."serviceTeikyoYM" = 一時."serviceTeikyoYM" AND 償還払."seiriNo" = 一時."seiriNo" AND 一時."dataKubun" = '1' AND 一時."kozaDataFlag" = TRUE GROUP BY 償還払."hiHokenshaNo",償還払."serviceTeikyoYM",償還払."seiriNo",償還払."yoshikiNo" UNION ALL SELECT 償還払."hiHokenshaNo", 償還払."serviceTeikyoYM", 償還払."seiriNo", 償還払."yoshikiNo", SUM(償還払."shikyuKingaku") AS sum支給金額, SUM(償還払."sagakuKingaku") AS sum差額金額 FROM rgdb."DbT3046ShokanServicePlan200604" AS 償還払 INNER JOIN "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" AS 一時 ON 償還払."hiHokenshaNo" = 一時."hihokenshaNo" AND 償還払."serviceTeikyoYM" = 一時."serviceTeikyoYM" AND 償還払."seiriNo" = 一時."seiriNo" AND 一時."dataKubun" = '1' AND 一時."kozaDataFlag" = TRUE GROUP BY 償還払."hiHokenshaNo",償還払."serviceTeikyoYM",償還払."seiriNo",償還払."yoshikiNo" UNION ALL SELECT 償還払."hiHokenshaNo", 償還払."serviceTeikyoYM", 償還払."seiriNo", 償還払."yoshikiNo", SUM(償還払."shikyuKingaku") AS sum支給金額, SUM(償還払."sagakuKingaku") AS sum差額金額 FROM ( SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT3047ShokanServicePlan200904" AS mst WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT3047ShokanServicePlan200904" AS slv WHERE mst."hiHokenshaNo" = slv."hiHokenshaNo" AND mst."serviceTeikyoYM" = slv."serviceTeikyoYM" AND mst."seiriNo" = slv."seiriNo" AND mst."jigyoshaNo" = slv."jigyoshaNo" AND mst."yoshikiNo" = slv."yoshikiNo" AND mst."meisaiNo" = slv."meisaiNo" AND mst."renban" < slv."renban" ) )AS 償還払 INNER JOIN "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" AS 一時 ON 償還払."hiHokenshaNo" = 一時."hihokenshaNo" AND 償還払."serviceTeikyoYM" = 一時."serviceTeikyoYM" AND 償還払."seiriNo" = 一時."seiriNo" AND 一時."dataKubun" = '1' AND 一時."kozaDataFlag" = TRUE GROUP BY 償還払."hiHokenshaNo",償還払."serviceTeikyoYM",償還払."seiriNo",償還払."yoshikiNo" UNION ALL SELECT 償還払."hiHokenshaNo", 償還払."serviceTeikyoYM", 償還払."seiriNo", 償還払."yoshikiNo", '0' AS sum支給金額, SUM(償還払."sagakuKingaku") AS sum差額金額 FROM rgdb."DbT3048ShokanFukushiYoguHanbaihi" AS 償還払 INNER JOIN "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" AS 一時 ON 償還払."hiHokenshaNo" = 一時."hihokenshaNo" AND 償還払."serviceTeikyoYM" = 一時."serviceTeikyoYM" AND 償還払."seiriNo" = 一時."seiriNo" AND 一時."dataKubun" = '1' AND 一時."kozaDataFlag" = TRUE GROUP BY 償還払."hiHokenshaNo",償還払."serviceTeikyoYM",償還払."seiriNo",償還払."yoshikiNo" UNION ALL SELECT 償還払."hiHokenshaNo", 償還払."serviceTeikyoYM", 償還払."seiriNo", 償還払."yoshikiNo", '0' AS sum支給金額, SUM(償還払."sagakuKingaku") AS sum差額金額 FROM rgdb."DbT3049ShokanJutakuKaishu" AS 償還払 INNER JOIN "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" AS 一時 ON 償還払."hiHokenshaNo" = 一時."hihokenshaNo" AND 償還払."serviceTeikyoYM" = 一時."serviceTeikyoYM" AND 償還払."seiriNo" = 一時."seiriNo" AND 一時."dataKubun" = '1' AND 一時."kozaDataFlag" = TRUE GROUP BY 償還払."hiHokenshaNo",償還払."serviceTeikyoYM",償還払."seiriNo",償還払."yoshikiNo" UNION ALL SELECT 償還払."hiHokenshaNo", 償還払."serviceTeikyoYM", 償還払."seiriNo", 償還払."yoshikiNo", SUM(償還払."shikyuKingaku") AS sum支給金額, SUM(償還払."seikyugakuSagakuKingaku"+償還払."dekidakaSeikyugakuSagaku") AS sum差額金額 FROM ( SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT3053ShokanShukei" WHERE "yoshikiNo" NOT IN('21C1','21C2','21D1','21D2') ) AS 償還払 INNER JOIN "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" AS 一時 ON 償還払."hiHokenshaNo" = 一時."hihokenshaNo" AND 償還払."serviceTeikyoYM" = 一時."serviceTeikyoYM" AND 償還払."seiriNo" = 一時."seiriNo" AND 一時."dataKubun" = '1' AND 一時."kozaDataFlag" = TRUE GROUP BY 償還払."hiHokenshaNo",償還払."serviceTeikyoYM",償還払."seiriNo",償還払."yoshikiNo" UNION ALL SELECT 償還払."hiHokenshaNo", 償還払."serviceTeikyoYM", 償還払."seiriNo", 償還払."yoshikiNo", SUM(償還払."shikyuKingaku") AS sum支給金額, '0' AS sum差額金額 FROM ( SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT3053ShokanShukei" WHERE "yoshikiNo" NOT IN('21C1','21C2','21D1','21D2') ) AS 償還払 INNER JOIN "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" AS 一時 ON 償還払."hiHokenshaNo" = 一時."hihokenshaNo" AND 償還払."serviceTeikyoYM" = 一時."serviceTeikyoYM" AND 償還払."seiriNo" = 一時."seiriNo" AND 一時."dataKubun" = '1' AND 一時."kozaDataFlag" = TRUE GROUP BY 償還払."hiHokenshaNo",償還払."serviceTeikyoYM",償還払."seiriNo",償還払."yoshikiNo" UNION ALL SELECT 償還払."hiHokenshaNo", 償還払."serviceTeikyoYM", 償還払."seiriNo", 償還払."yoshikiNo", SUM(償還払."shikyuKingaku") AS sum支給金額, SUM(償還払."sagakuKingaku") AS sum差額金額 FROM rgdb."DbT3050ShokanTokuteiNyushoshaKaigoServiceHiyo" AS 償還払 INNER JOIN "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" AS 一時 ON 償還払."hiHokenshaNo" = 一時."hihokenshaNo" AND 償還払."serviceTeikyoYM" = 一時."serviceTeikyoYM" AND 償還払."seiriNo" = 一時."seiriNo" AND 一時."dataKubun" = '1' AND 一時."kozaDataFlag" = TRUE GROUP BY 償還払."hiHokenshaNo",償還払."serviceTeikyoYM",償還払."seiriNo",償還払."yoshikiNo" )
SELECT 振込明細一時TBL.*, 様式番号別金額.*, 名寄せ件数表.NUM FROM "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" AS 振込明細一時TBL LEFT JOIN ( SELECT 様式番号別集計."hiHokenshaNo", 様式番号別集計."serviceTeikyoYM", 様式番号別集計."seiriNo", 様式番号別集計."yoshikiNo", SUM(様式番号別集計."sum支給金額") AS 支給金額計, SUM(様式番号別集計."sum差額金額") AS 差額金額計 FROM 様式番号別集計 GROUP BY 様式番号別集計."hiHokenshaNo", 様式番号別集計."serviceTeikyoYM", 様式番号別集計."seiriNo", 様式番号別集計."yoshikiNo" HAVING '0'< SUM(様式番号別集計."sum支給金額") OR '0'< SUM(様式番号別集計."sum差額金額") ) AS 様式番号別金額 ON 振込明細一時TBL."hihokenshaNo" = 様式番号別金額."hiHokenshaNo" AND 振込明細一時TBL."serviceTeikyoYM" = 様式番号別金額."serviceTeikyoYM" AND 振込明細一時TBL."seiriNo" = 様式番号別金額."seiriNo" INNER JOIN ( SELECT "kozaNayoseKey", COUNT(*) AS NUM FROM "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai" WHERE '0'<"DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."furikomiKingaku" AND "DbWT0510FurikomiMeisai"."kozaDataFlag" = TRUE GROUP BY "kozaNayoseKey" ) AS 名寄せ件数表 ON 振込明細一時TBL."kozaNayoseKey" = 名寄せ件数表."kozaNayoseKey" WHERE '0'<振込明細一時TBL."furikomiKingaku" AND 振込明細一時TBL."kozaDataFlag" = TRUE ORDER BY 振込明細一時TBL."kinyuKikanCode" ASC, 振込明細一時TBL."kinyuKikanShitenCode" ASC ${出力順}, 振込明細一時TBL."hihokenshaNo" ASC, 振込明細一時TBL."serviceTeikyoYM" ASC, 振込明細一時TBL."dataKubun" ASC, 振込明細一時TBL."seiriNo" ASC, 振込明細一時TBL."rirekiNo" ASC, 様式番号別金額."yoshikiNo" ASC

SELECT mst."shikibetsuNo", mst."meisho2" FROM rgdb."DbT3118ShikibetsuNoKanri" AS mst WHERE "shikibetsuNoKubon" = '2' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT3118ShikibetsuNoKanri" AS slv WHERE mst."shikibetsuNo" = slv."shikibetsuNo" AND mst."tekiyoKaishiYM"<slv."tekiyoKaishiYM" )
